nodes.bodyText: If the dangling line is merged (and is considered as a line), should it return null or fail the cast? It seems that when we try getConnectable(b, A.class) if b is not an instance of A, there is an exception during the cast, not a returned null? I don't know if it can be easily done though.

In the merging view, the dangling line doesn't exists anymore. So, if you get a DanglingLine from the delegate, and it's merged, you should ignore it (the mergedLine has its own ID).
But, you right, I should change the end of this method if the connectable is not null, to have the same error than in the iidm-impl

Hi @mathbagu ! I have tried to resolve this fixme and it is fix with this #1316
